text: James Greene (19 May 1931 - January 2021) was a Northern Irish actor. He played lawyers, clergymen, army officers and judges on many movies and television shows.James Greene at Ulster Actors.com. retrieved 31 August 2013 He was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. He played Scottish clergyman in Johnny English (2003), Roy in the medial drama Holby City and as Mr. Hubble in Big School. Greene died in January 2021, aged 89.Belfast-born Doctor Who actor dies aged 89 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from Belfast
title: James Greene (Northern Irish actor)
